DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to determine if after 24 weeks of oral daily administration, there will be a greater mean reduction from baseline in glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) achieved with Dapagliflozin 10 mg plus insulin compared to placebo plus insulin in subjects with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Insulin Add-On Asia Regional Program - ST
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com. Subjects must have type 2 diabetes with inadequate glycemic control, defined as HbA1c ≥ 7.5% and ≤ 11.0% obtained at screening visit Subjects must be taking a stable mean dose of ≥ 20 IU injectable insulin daily for at least 8 weeks prior to enrollment Treatment with more than two oral antidiabetic (OAD) agents within 6 weeks of Enrollment
